effect.sun_moon: Inflicts regular damage. Only Pokémon that share a type with the user will take damage from this move.
effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Inflicts regular damage. Only Pokémon that share a type with the user will take damage from this move.
effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Inflicts regular damage. Only Pokémon that share a type with the user will take damage from this move.

short_effect.sun_moon: Hits any Pokémon that shares a type with the user.
short_effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Hits any Pokémon that shares a type with the user.
short_effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Hits any Pokémon that shares a type with the user.

flavor_text.sun_moon: Using an odd shock wave, the user inflicts damage on any Pokémon of the same type in the area around it.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Using an odd shock wave, the user inflicts damage on any Pokémon of the same type in the area around it.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Using an odd shock wave, the user inflicts damage on any Pokémon of the same type in the area around it.
